description: Get free HIV testing & counselling today!
title: Local HIV Testing & Counselling Hotline from Zvandiri is 116!
content:
Zvandiri Call : 116

Zvandiri provides community based prevention, treatment, care and support for children and adolescents living with HIV!

If you want to get in-touch with Zvandiri please call their toll-free number 116 for confidential assistance
